field.name: summary
field.value: Option to remove prefix from generated property names

field.name: description
field.value:
It would be nice to have an option that removes a prefix, or all text preceding a specified character (eg. underscore) before generating the property names.
eg. Given the convention for a database table named "MY_IMPORTANT_THINGS" and columns MIT_ID MIT_NAME MIT_UPDATED
it would be really nice to trim the "MIT_" bit off the front so you end up with nicer properties like:
Id Name Updated
I'm not sure whether this would be a model-wide setting, or done for each class. Model-wide would be better for me.
